name: B. Grime Zoo
statement:
Currently, XXOC’s rap is a string consisting of zeroes, ones, and
question marks. Unfortunately, haters gonna hate. They will write x
angry comments for every occurrence of and y angry comments for every
occurrence of . You should replace all the question marks with or in
such a way that the number of angry comments would be as small as
possible.String b is a subsequence of string a, if it can be obtained by
removing some characters from a. Two occurrences of a subsequence are
considered distinct if sets of positions of remaining characters are
distinct.
